name: Block Slender Man 3D - Lucky Survivor Worldwide Multiplayer Edition
name_original: Block Slender Man 3D - Lucky Survivor Worldwide Multiplayer Edition
description:
++ Dare You Confront Him? ++
++ SUPER SCARY 3D SLENDER-MAN FPS GAME FOR SLENDERMAN, FPS ++

••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

Choose your SKIN and FIGHT!

Block Slender Man in MULTIPLAYER MODE! Now with WORLDWIDE MODE!
Now you have a perfect chance to battle with your friends, classmates and colleagues or anyone else around the world! You can create and customize your character and then show off on the battle field!

*** MULTIPLAYER DEATHMATCH ***

Multiplayer mode benefits:
• WORLDWIDE fantastic game
• 4 unique maps of various shapes and sizes;
• 4 players in one game support;
• challenging and exciting experience that can really get you hooked!

*** SINGLE PLAYER MODE ***

• Find all the 12 manuscripts before Slender-Man finds you
• Awesome Scary Sounds/Musics and Visual effects
• dynamic Slender AI
• Scary dark atmosphere
• Unique ASL System
• Great Achivments

••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

DOWNLOAD FAST AND PLAY WITH YOUR FRIENDS ALL OVER THE WORLD!!
•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

THIS IS YOUR GAME, IF YOU LIKE SLENDERMAN AND CUBE STYLE

Unique MULTIPLAYER BLOCK-BASED shooter Slender Man game! Download it and INVITE also YOUR FRIENDS, then it clears up, who will stay alive and who will be killed by the Slender Man.

You can choose, which character you play with and what kind of facilities your characters will have.

Features

- MULTIPLAYER MODE
- CHARACTER SELECTION
- Awesome Retina graphics
- GAMECENTER SUPPORT
- Fantastic Special Effects
- Scary Music
- Intense HORROR atmosphere
- Easy controls

The great Slender shooter game, you must have a try.Don't miss it!!!

Use headphones when playing, ideally at night and alone! ;)

If you experience any issues with sound etc. please close all backgroud apps
